title: Tech Stocks to Watch: The Tech Cold War with China
description: Barron's senior managing editor Lauren R. Rublin and associate editor for technology Eric Savitz discuss the recent slide in tech stocks, the tech "cold war" with China, and the iPhone 14.
itunes:author: Barron's Live
itunes:summary: Barron's senior managing editor Lauren R. Rublin and associate editor for technology Eric Savitz discuss the recent slide in tech stocks, the tech "cold war" with China, and the iPhone 14.
